meanings: a heavy colorless and relatively inert gaseous element that occurs in air as about one part in 2 0 million and is used especially in specialized electric lamps ( such as flash tubes ) and in scientific research see chemical elements table
a heavy colorless gaseous element that occurs in air in minute quantities and is used especially in specialized electric lamps see element
a heavy, colorless, and relatively inert gaseous element that occurs in air as about one part in 2 0 million by volume

a person unduly fearful of what is foreign and especially of people of foreign origin

transplantation of an organ, tissue, or cells between two different species ( as a human and a domestic swine )

a complex tissue in the vascular system of higher plants that consists of vessels, trac he ids, or both usually together with wood fibers and parenchyma cells, functions chiefly in conduction of water and dissolved minerals but also in support and food storage, and typically constitutes the woody element ( as of a plant stem ) compare phloem

a tissue of higher plants that carries water and dissolved materials upward, functions also in support and storage, lies deeper inside the plant than the phloem, and usually makes up the woody parts ( as of a plant stem ) compare phloem

a percussion instrument consisting of a series of wooden bars graduated in length to produce the musical scale, supported on belts of straw or felt, and sounded by striking with two small wooden hammers
a musical instrument consisting of a series of wooden bars varying in length and sounded by striking with two wooden hammers
